General.Name: Chime Ball Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Chime Ball Technology Co.,Ltd. engages in the research, development, production, and marketing of CCD semi-automatic exposure machines in Taiwan. It offers green LED and mercury lamp source exposure units, including inner layer, outer layer, and solder mask UV-LED exposure units; and direct imaging systems, as well as others, such as automatic lamination units, exposure lamps, UV energy illuminometers, and touch panel with exposure machines. The company was founded in 1999 and is based in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No.33, Changxing Road, Taoyuan City, Taiwan, 338
